participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, enjoys engaging in conversations and has a passion for music.
participant_1.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and adventurous, loves exploring new cuisines and is eager to improve cooking skills.
participant_2.background: hey there i'm 23 and i love food. i also like to cook but i'm not very good at it. i have been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years.

content.text: Hi! I am doing great! Just got off work.
Nice, how old are you? I am 23
23 years old, i love food, and you?
I like to cook. I like to cook.
Ohh, i also like cooking but i am suck at it
I like cooking too much. I like cooking.
I also love travelling, and i always eat something new everywhere i go
Nice, are you good at cooking?
I am not. I just finished cooking.
Neat, but i should get going, bye
